member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.ContactsController.GetContacts
member.summary: Retrieves all contacts from the list of contacts
member.remarks: To get the skills details, use GET request with Contacts/{id}

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.ContactsController.GetContact(System.Int64)
member.summary: Retrieves details of a contact from his id

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.ContactsController.PostContact(ContactModel)
member.summary: Insert a new contact in your list. /1\ You need to be authenticated) /1\ /2\ Only fill the fields firstName, lastName, fullName, address, email, phone /2\

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.ContactsController.PutContact(System.Int64,ContactModel)
member.summary: Change a single contact in the list from ID /!\ You need to be authenticated) /!\

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.ContactsController.DeleteContactModel(System.Int64)
member.summary: Delete a contact from the list /!\ You need to be authenticated) /!\

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.SkillsController.GetSkill
member.summary: Retrieves all skills from the list of skills

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.SkillsController.GetSkill(System.Int64)
member.summary: Retrieves details of a skill from its id

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.SkillsController.PutSkill(System.Int64,SkillModel)
member.summary: Change a single skill in the list from its ID

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.SkillsController.PostSkill(SkillModel)
member.summary: Insert a new skill in the list
member.remarks: The skill's ContactModelId should match with an existing contact's ContactModelId. The a contact can't have two skills with the same name

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.SkillsController.DeleteSkill(System.Int64)
member.summary: Delete a skill from the list

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.UsersController.Register(UserModel)
member.summary: Add a new User /!\ Only fill the fields username and password /!\

member.name: M:ContactsAPI.Controllers.UsersController.Unregister(System.String)
member.summary: Delete a user /!\ You can only delete yourself /!\
